{{Infobox dungeon |name = Wayward Cave |image = [[File:Wayward Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Wayward Cave |tokens = 56,500 |location = On Route 206, South of Eterna City. }} '''Wayward Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Sinnoh]].

{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 651,500 |- | Boss || 2,400,000 |}
